example

类 FullScreenWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • example.FullScreenWindow

  • public class FullScreenWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    A window that takes over the full screen. You can put exactly one JComponent into the window. If there are multiple screens attached to the computer, this class will display buttons on each screen so that the user can select which one receives the full-screen window.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) class  FullScreenWindow.PickMe
      A button that appears on a particular graphics device, asking whether that device should be used for multiple-monitor choices.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private boolean dead
      Whether this FullScreenWindow has been used.
      private static java.awt.GraphicsDevice defaultScreen
      The screen that the user last chose for displaying a FullScreenWindow
      private Flag flag
      Flag indicating whether the user has selected a screen or not.
      private javax.swing.JFrame jf
      The JFrame filling the screen
      private java.awt.GraphicsDevice pickedDevice 
      private java.awt.GraphicsDevice screen
      The current screen for the FullScreenWindow

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FullScreenWindow(javax.swing.JComponent part)
      Create a full screen window containing a JComponent.
      FullScreenWindow(javax.swing.JComponent part, boolean forcechoice)
      Create a full screen window containing a JComponent, and ask the user which screen they'd like to use if more than one is present.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close the full screen window.
      private void init(javax.swing.JComponent part, boolean forcechoice)
      Create the window, asking for which screen to use if there are multiple monitors and either forcechoice is true, or the user hasn't already picked a screen.
      private void pickDevice(java.awt.GraphicsDevice gd)
      Select a particular screen for display of this window, and set the flag.
      private java.awt.GraphicsDevice pickScreen(java.awt.GraphicsDevice[] scrns)
      Displays a button on each attached monitor, and returns the GraphicsDevice object associated with that monitor.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • defaultScreen

        private static java.awt.GraphicsDevice defaultScreen
        The screen that the user last chose for displaying a FullScreenWindow

      • screen

        private java.awt.GraphicsDevice screen
        The current screen for the FullScreenWindow

      • jf

        private javax.swing.JFrame jf
        The JFrame filling the screen

      • dead

        private boolean dead
        Whether this FullScreenWindow has been used. Each FullScreenWindow can only be displayed once.

      • flag

        private Flag flag
        Flag indicating whether the user has selected a screen or not.

      • pickedDevice

        private java.awt.GraphicsDevice pickedDevice

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FullScreenWindow

        public FullScreenWindow(javax.swing.JComponent part,
                boolean forcechoice)
        Create a full screen window containing a JComponent, and ask the user which screen they'd like to use if more than one is present.
        参数:
        part - the JComponent to display
        forcechoice - true if you want force the display of the screen choice buttons. If false, buttons will only display if the user hasn't previously picked a screen.

      • FullScreenWindow

        public FullScreenWindow(javax.swing.JComponent part)
        Create a full screen window containing a JComponent. The user will only be asked which screen to display on if there are multiple monitors attached and the user hasn't already made a choice.
        参数:
        part - the JComponent to display

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the full screen window. This particular FullScreenWindow object cannot be used again.

      • init

        private void init(javax.swing.JComponent part,
        boolean forcechoice)
        Create the window, asking for which screen to use if there are multiple monitors and either forcechoice is true, or the user hasn't already picked a screen.
        参数:
        part - the JComponent to display
        forcechoice - false if user shouldn't be asked twice which of several monitors to use.

      • pickDevice

        private void pickDevice(java.awt.GraphicsDevice gd)
        Select a particular screen for display of this window, and set the flag.

      • pickScreen

        private java.awt.GraphicsDevice pickScreen(java.awt.GraphicsDevice[] scrns)
        Displays a button on each attached monitor, and returns the GraphicsDevice object associated with that monitor.
        参数:
        scrns - a list of GraphicsDevices on which to display buttons
        返回:
        the GraphicsDevice selected.
